Target: Ontology used to calculate exposures to the environment

Comment: Number of features within the buffer of the trajectory
Label: Count

Comment: Total intersected area between the trajectory buffer and exposure elements (polygons)
Label: Area

Comment: Number of features within the buffer of a fixed vector element
Label: Count
